account_settings.name: high_quality
account_settings.desc: The users ability to upload higher quality images, there will be less compression
Automatically allow all images to be publicly accessible
account_settings.name: public_images
album_privacy
account_settings.desc: Set the album privacy to this privacy setting on creation

account_settings.name: pro_expiration
account_settings.desc: False if not a pro user, their expiration date if they are.
True if the user has accepted the terms of uploading to the Imgur gallery.
account_settings.name: accepted_gallery_terms

account_settings.desc: The email addresses that have been activated to allow uploading
account_settings.name: active_emails

account_settings.desc: If the user is accepting incoming messages or not
account_settings.name: messaging_enabled
blocked_users
account_settings.desc: An array of users that have been blocked from messaging, the object is blocked_id and blocked_url.
True if the user has opted to have mature images displayed in gallery list endpoints.
account_settings.name: show_mature

account_settings.desc: True unless the user created their account via a third party service such as Google Plus.
account_settings.name: first_party

album.name: id
album.desc: The ID for the album

album.name: title
album.desc: The title of the album in the gallery

album.name: description
album.desc: The description of the album in the gallery
Time inserted into the gallery, epoch time
album.name: datetime
cover
album.desc: The ID of the album cover image
The width, in pixels, of the album cover image
album.name: cover_width
cover_height
album.desc: The height, in pixels, of the album cover image
The account username or null if it's anonymous.
album.name: account_url

album.desc: The account ID  or null if it's anonymous.
album.name: account_id

album.desc: The privacy level of the album, you can only view public if not logged in as album owner
album.name: privacy

album.desc: The view layout of the album.
album.name: layout

album.desc: The number of album views
album.name: views
link
album.desc: The URL link to the album

album.name: favorite
album.desc: Indicates if the current user favorited the image. Defaults to false if not signed in.

album.name: nsfw
album.desc: Indicates if the image has been marked as nsfw or not. Defaults to null if information is not available.
If the image has been categorized by our backend then this will contain the section the image belongs in. (funny, cats, adviceanimals, wtf, etc)
album.name: section

album.desc: Order number of the album on the user's album page (defaults to 0 if their albums haven't been reordered)
album.name: order
deletehash
album.desc: OPTIONAL, the deletehash, if you're logged in as the album owner
The total number of images in the album
album.name: images_count

album.desc: An array of all the images in the album (only available when requesting the direct album)
album.name: images
in_gallery
album.desc: True if the image has been submitted to the gallery, false if otherwise.

link

account.desc: The account id for the username requested.

bio

account.desc: False if not a pro user, their expiration date if they are.
